name: Horror House (JoelGAMEDev)
description:
Someone enter your house!You are scared if something happen to you.You called the police and the police said they will reach your house in 40min(18min in-game).Survive until the police arive!

In release 1.00

-Phone(use as timer)

-More room

-Added some furniture

This game is on hold for now.Sorry.

Why?

-I dunno how to make the AI enemy working
